content.body: Hello! I think i've spotted a typo in `nooopener-allow-popups`. there is an additional o in https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/browsers.html#coop-noopener-allow-popups . I'm opening n MR to fix this

content.body: keithamus:  Hmm, doesn't the step 4 assert in https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#show-popover fail if beforetoggle (once:true) listener doesn't call preventDefault() but calls showPopover()
